title: We've moved websites! - Rekt Capital Newsletter
content:
The Rekt Capital Newsletter has moved to its new websitehttps://newsletter.rektcapital.co!

That means this Substack account will no longer be updated.

So if you have not yet subscribed - don’t subscribe here,subscribe on our new website!

Subscribe to the Rekt Capital Newsletter

After delivering almost 3 years and over 650+ editions of the Rekt Capital Newsletter straight to your inbox,I’m delighted to announce a new home for the newsletter.

The sole aim of the Rekt Capital Newsletter has and always will be to deliver cutting-edge, level-headed market insights on Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies and it is my true hope that operating independently only adds to that vision.

If you have a free or premium membership, you will still receive newsletters as normal - straight into your inbox, three times a week.

If you’re already a subscriber, no need to re-subscribe as you’ve already been automatically migrated over. Your membership will give you access to all posts on thenew site: https://newsletter.rektcapital.co

Since your membership has been migrated over to the new site, you will no longer have access to premium content on this Substack account. This Substack account will no longer be updated.

The new home for all newsletter content ishttps://newsletter.rektcapital.co

Let me know if you have any questions or feedback - feel free to contact me via email (rektcapital@gmail.com) or onTwitter. My inbox is always open.

Subscribe to the Rekt Capital Newsletter
